Rewards Rate: 15 Fuel Points/₹100 Spent at Indian Oil Stations and 2 Fuel Points/₹100 on Other Eligible Spends
Reward Redemption: 1 Fuel Point = ₹0.50 When Redeemed at IndianOil Outlets

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹2.75 Lakh
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Fuel Surcharge Waiver Upto ₹200 Each Month
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the Cash Amount or a Minimum of ₹500

product_details: The IndianOil RBL XTRA is a fuel-oriented credit card.
Cardmembers can save on fueling expenses made with IndianOil.
Fuel points are worth up to 250 liters of free petrol annually.
15 Fuel Points/₹100 spent on fuel purchases with IndianOil.
Other spends shall get 2 Fuel Points/₹100 spent.
